name: Trumpocalypse 2020
description:
TRUMPOCALYPSE 2020 Summary

The year 2020 has been filled with one disaster after another. Whether it be covid-19, locust swarms, large fires, or some other disaster, the year has also been one of highly charged politics. The United States is undergoing a lot of change, and many are divided.

You play as the picture of freedom, a floating eagle head the size of a small country. Your extremely important role is to glide across the country and rally the people to turn the states blue and defeat the current supreme leader of the states, Trump. You also have to contend with disasters that threaten the very lives of the states, so terrible that the vivid color turns deathly black.

Can you beat Trump in the election? Can you keep States alive for all of 2020?

Find out!

Controls

WASD or Arrows to move

Mouse to click!

How to Play

2020 has declared war on democracy and the lives of Americans. Traverse the states as 2020 disasters occurs and rally to keep supreme leader Trump from taking over the country.

Using RALLY:
blue state - grants money for the cause
red state  - attempt to change the views of the state for 2M
orange state - attempt to change views for 5M

Using SUPPLY:
A state that is in a DISASTER status can be saved if you provide it with 25K supply. 

Gain SUPPLY by requesting foreign aid, this will cost 25M

Win the election and prevent the states from perishing to disaster!
